events.message: The policyholder has submitted a claim for an auto accident involving their vehicle on April 29th.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the nature of the collision described.
An agent has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim and to communicate further steps to the customer.
The claim has been acknowledged by the insurance company with confirmation sent to the customer email.
Customer was asked to provide the police report and photographs of the damaged vehicle to support the claim.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and damage photos for review.
The investigation team has begun assessing the details of the collision and the vehicle damage.
The investigation concluded the collision was caused by negligence of the other driver.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and rental expenses has been proposed to the claimant.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the service.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following confirmation of all documents.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the customer's account without delay.
The claim case was closed after successful payment and no further issues were reported by the customer.
The closed auto accident claim was archived in the records for future reference and auditing purposes.
